Create a smart playlist with the rule: Play count → is in the range → 5 → to → 10. Play on shuffle. That’s it. If you’re one to rate your music add the rule: Rating → is → no stars. Finds music you like enough to listen to more than a few times but leaves out the music you obviously love because you’ve listened to it heaps (or rated it highly). As time goes on it’ll curate songs itself.
